Class Pixel

java.lang.Object
  Pixel

public class Pixel
extends java.lang.Object

Class to represent a pixel (Picture Element).

Author:
Cay Horstman, Barb Ericson - modified to change setRed, setGreen and setBlue to reset the color value to between 0 and 255.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs a pixel at a given location in a picture.
